definitions.definition: A sound or action like liquid hitting a hard surface, or an object falling into a body of water.
definitions.example: He heard the plops of rain on the roof.

definitions.definition: Excrement; derived from the "plop" sound made when it hits water in a toilet.
To make the sound of an object dropping into a body of liquid.

definitions.example: He plopped down on the sofa to watch TV.

definitions.definition: To defecate; derived from the "plop" sound made when excrement hits water in a toilet.
